name: HUGO (itch) (MilkManSavesTheUniverse)
description:
Hugo is a horror survival themed adventure game, where the player is a tiny human in a large scale world, who is trying to leave a house full of monster.

After a long journey in the rain,  Hugo found a house, which thought would bring him safe shelter, he realizes things are not as they appear.

Age: 12+

Controls :

WASD -- walk

--------------------

tips:

Avoid the creature's vision by hiding behind playing blocks.

Controls can vary depending on where camera is facing,  take in account where the player is facing.

--------------------

Made by;

William Clarke

Warning: Themes of death, suicide, which may not be suitable for a younger audience.
